description:
Spacious and bright one-bedroom apartment right next to the spectacular Fort Tyron Park. Stay in this leafy and charming area near Harlem, Upper West Side and just 30 minutes away from midtown!
My place features cozy and bright living and dining area, fully equipped kitchen, all-marble bathroom, and a large bedroom with king-size bed and plenty of storage.

The apartment is located on the 3rd floor of a well-kept prewar walkup and comes with designer furniture, all hardwood floors, and a lush king-size bed in a private and very quiet bedroom. There is a queen-size air mattress for the folks who sleep in the living room.

You’ll have access to laundry (in the building), dishwasher, cable TV with 250+ channels and Wi-Fi. The drawer in the bedroom is for you to use, as well as the two big cloths racks.

I’ll provide my number and I’ll be available as often as needed.

Up-and-coming, safe, and full of natural charms. The Cloisters, Inwood Hill Park, and lots of local flavor restaurants are all minutes away.

The A express train and the 1 local train are both 5 min walk away.
name: Stylish home in Upper Manhattan
review: Accommodations are exactly as described and pictured.  Very clean. Comfortable.
